1.title: Çukur
1.plot: One of the most troubled parts of Istanbul. In Çukur, where drugs are never allowed, the order is disturbed by the emergence of a group that has an eye on this neighborhood.

2.title: Çukur Her Yerde
2.plot: Cumali's events with black lambs in the past shocked Yamaç. He will join in this great struggle to gather family and Çukur. The revenge fire began to burn in Çukur.

3.title: Üç Silahsörler
3.plot: Yamaç is determined to take back Çukur from Black Lambs. And he asks for one chance from Cumali; if they cannot collect the Çukur in their own way, they will follow Cumali's road.

4.title: Yanimda misiniz?
4.plot: Yamaç, Vartolu and Cumali combine their forces. Koçovali Brothers take action to regain Çukur. However, high blood pressure between Cumali and Vartolu will make work harder for Yamaç.

5.title: Kim Kurtaracak?
5.plot: Koçovali Brothers who have been defeated by Karakuzular, will quickly recover and re-attack. In the meantime, a new threat poses against Koçovali brothers. The dose of danger and action also increases.

6.title: Pes Etmedik
6.plot: Yamaç, along with Vartolu, Medet, Metin and Kemal, will ask for help from Aliço and mobilize their plans to save Cumali. But it will not be easy for them to reach their goals.

7.title: Yeni Basliyoruz
7.plot: Yamaç will go mad after Vartolu doesn't listen to him and gets caught. Now he will have to rescue Vartolu too. Yamaç takes Metin and Kemal along and makes a move. Mahsun will make a plan to rescue Çeto but he will unexpectedly encounter Yamaç. Karaca will ask Sena's help in this challenging episode. The viewers will experience emotional moments when Selim encounters Idris.

8.title: Aslan Parçasi
8.plot: With the help of Aliço, Yamaç will make new plans against Karakuzular. Selim finally faces his father.

9.title: Babam
9.plot: Yamaç continues to receive information from Ersoy. Çeto's plan for Vartolu will lead Vartolu to a difficult decision.

10.title: Vartolu Sadettin
10.plot: The greatest trump card in the hands of Ceto is Saadet. Vartolu therefore gives up Salih and returns to his old days.

11.title: Oglum
11.plot: Yamac won't let Ersoy go. As he continues to receive information from him, he will reveal some of the secrets he will learn. And these secrets will give Yamac a hard time.

12.title: Çukur'un Çocuklari
12.plot: Mahsun and Çeto play the game to the Koçovali family and they hunt themselves. The offer of Ersoy to Yamaç will change the color of the struggle between the Kocovalilar and Karakuzular.

13.title: Ailem
13.plot: The fact that Çukur's children are in the hands of Karakuzular will make Yamaç and Cumali crazy. Yamaç doubts the neighbor who introduced himself as Fikret. Yamaç will receive intelligence from Ersoy.

14.title: Umut
14.plot: Vartolu tells Çeto and Mahsun that there is a mole between them increases. Thanks to the hint that Aliço grabs, Yamaç will approach the secrets of Vartolu.

15.title: Aile Herseydir
15.plot: The sounds of fire in the pit will be a harbinger of a new and much bigger storm, and will launch a new era. Are the Koçovali family able to take back Çukur?

16.title: Yamaç'i kim vurdu?
16.plot: Yamaç Koçovali, who was heavily wounded with the bullets he received, will give a life battle. The Koçovian brothers who are taking action will to find the traitor at any cost.

17.title: Neden?
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Eve Dönüyoruz
18.plot: As the Kocovans rejoiced in the health of Yamac, Yamac's decision would drag him back into danger. By the way, "Who Shot Yamac?" this answer to the question will be found.

19.title: Kardesmiyiz
19.plot: The suspicion that the Kocovans had someone above Karakuzular will be further strengthened by Ceto's demand. Cumali and Salih's step will lead them to a surprise.

20.title: Benim Mahallem
20.plot: In the neighborhood, a feeling of unity is formed, while the Kocovans will take action to recover their old business. But each time the Black Lambs will make their work difficult.

21.title: Episode #2.21

1.title: Baslangiç
1.plot: Cukur, one of the most dangerous neighborhoods of Istanbul, is ruled by the Kocova family. Although they are closely related to crime, the family has its own rules. One of these rules is the prohibition of drugs. Drugs cannot be produced, used or sold in Cukur. But one of the upstarts is determined to break the ban. First he tries to negotiate with the Kocova's but when his request is rejected he attacks the neighborhood and the family with his power. Just as he thinks that he has put the family on their knees something unpredicted comes up. Now the cards need to be ...

2.title: Ya Sen
2.plot: Yamac takes a new turn in his life. His brother Kahraman was murdered. His father has been taken to the hospital. War begins between Vartolu and his men and the pit. Yamac's mind is in Sena at the same time. Sena goes to Izmir next to her family. However, they will meet soon and find themselves in great danger.

3.title: Savas mi Baris mi?
3.plot: Vartolu is determined to destroy every obstacle in front of him. But he is also unaware that he hit a hard rock like Yamac. Yamac will bring Sena to your father's house after the attack. In the Sultan's eyes, Sena and Sultan, who are regarded as the people to disrupt the order of the family, face each other. Meanwhile, Yamac is willing to make peace with Vartolu. While a surprise name will witness this moment of peace, the balances between Yamac and Selim will also change completely.

4.title: Çukurdayiz
4.plot: Idris finally opens his eyes. A whole new era begins in the pit. The reaction of Idris, who sees Yamac at home, will be tougher than predicted. The great confrontation between the father and the son will overturn all the balances in the pit. Idris, who met Sena, learns that she is the wife of Yamac. Yamac not only struggles with the turbulent period at home, but also tries to find the traitor among them. Yamac's interest in the collection of the singer named Dogukan dragged him to the very heart of a great danger.

5.title: Aile her seydir!
5.plot: Yamac is determined to find the traitor among them. But there is a big obstacle opposite. It is much more difficult to convince Idris, who sees Yamac as one of every family, than to find a traitor. The tension between the father and the son gradually increases. Among the women of Kocovali are the storms. Sena has no intention of following Sultan Kocovali's rules. Selim makes a mistake that is irreversible. Vartolu, who looks at Idris Kocovali's place, will start the actual war.

6.title: Çukur Ailedir
6.plot: The tensions increasingly rise in The Pit. Yamac is even more suspicious after Isa\'s death. Despite respecting them as uncles, Emmi and Pasa become the head suspects for Yamac after the raid on the gun shipment. There will be permanent hierarchy changes in the already boiling neighborhood The Pit. Finding herself in a very different world, Sena sees Yamaç's other side and faces the biggest shock of her life. The mutual agreement between Selim and Vartolu changes. Celasun decides to rob a gun warehouse which belongs to the Koçovali family after finding out that his ...

7.title: Benim Mahallem
7.plot: Everything will change when Idris returns to the neighborhood and reminds his domination. Vartolu has no intention to step back. He's determined to undermine the Pit and rule the neighborhood. The ultimate challenge begins now. Yamaç will surprisingly find Vartolu's weak spot thanks to barber Muhittin. As Selim gets prepared for his new move during the storm in the Koçovali family and the neighborhood, Vartolu will shock the viewers with his best shot.

8.title: Oyun Basliyor
8.plot: Tension reaches its peak at The Pit neighborhood where everybody's playing by their own rules. Yamaç has found Vartolu's weak spot and has made his last shot to finish the game. Vartolu is going to give Idris and Yamaç the surprise of a lifetime in return for the unexpected blow he has received. Idris will question why Yamaç is not responding to this and will give him a life lesson. In the meantime, one of the underworld men Serdar will raise the tension when he comes to Selim's illegal gambling place. There's also a storm brewing among the women of the Koçovali ...

9.title: Vurulan Kim?
9.plot: Yamaç will face the ultimate test of his life. On one side his father Idirs and on the other side the woman he loves, Sena are in danger. Yamaç's reaction towards this event will surprise everyone especially Serdar. Selim who kidnaps Sena will get cornered. Vartolu and Celasun are kept in the bingo saloon by Serdar's men and they try to escape with Celasun's dangerous plan. But Celasun's plan harms an unexpected person during the moment that we hold our breaths. In the meantime; Serdar who sees that Yamaç is a tough guy, orders his men to attack The Pit. Idris's house...

10.title: Kardesmiyiz
10.plot: Yamaç, Sena and Serdar are in front of the bullet. One of them gets shot, but who? Meanwhile a great threat is awaiting the Koçovali women. Serdar's men raid Idris's house. Sultan and the other women's' fates depend on Vartolu who appears there at the time. Karaca's condition is critical after risking her life for Celasun. Selim is having a hard time against Yamaç and he's determined to make Serdar pay for having been cornered. Just when the tension rises, Yamaç faces one of the most difficult decisions of his life after Baykal's move to corner him.

11.title: Kimsin Sen
11.plot: The balance in The Pit has been disrupted. The struggle between Vartolu and Yamaç gets tense. The battle lines are drawn between them. In addition to this high tension confrontation Yamaç has to make a choice between Sena and The Pit. He's having the toughest time of his life. Selim is humiliated before Yamaç. He loses his temper and leads Yamaç to an almost irreversible mistake. In the meantime, Baykal and Lawyer Nazim will be busy with making dangerous moves. During the tense moments Idris will receive a mysterious letter that will start a new era in The Pit.

12.title: Benimle oyun oynama!
12.plot: While Baykal's moves are ticking, Yamac focuses on finding the traitor inside. Idris is determined to open the background of the past after the letter he received. Sultan makes a dangerous move and asks Pasa to help. Yamac is destroyed by the news of divorce from Sena. They will change everything.

13.title: Bana Masal Anlat Baba
13.plot: There is a great confrontation in the pit that will upset the balances. Idris Kocovali and Vartolu are now opposed. Idris, who learns that his son is alive, follows him. Yamac is very close to resolving Vartolu's identity. While Sena tries to escape from the pit and leave everything behind, Cukur realizes that she needs it. Feeling that Yamac is approaching his goal, Vartolu will face the risk of losing everything on his own, even if he has various kinds of obstacles in front of him.

14.title: Yüzlesme
14.plot: No secret can be hidden forever. There is an exciting period in the pit where great confrontations will take place. In the pit life will no longer be the same for anyone. The hillside learns that Vartolu is his brother. In the face of this great development that will upset your life, what is going to happen to Yamac is curious; the sins of the past will not leave a stone on the stone in the pit.

15.title: Hazirmisin?
15.plot: The big storm is about to break between Yamac and Idris, confronting his father's past. Trust in the neighborhood is shaken. Nothing in the pit is now like the old one.

16.title: Babamin Oglu
16.plot: Yamac is having trouble with the fact that he knows. His father's command "Vartolu, will leave Cukur" is a difficult decision for Yamac. Vartolu is between getting out of Cukur and getting revenge.

17.title: Kalbim Çukurda
17.plot: Vartolu's house changes his funeral balances. The confrontation series in the pit has become so hard as ever. An uninvited guest creates a storm in the pit.

18.title: Çukur Evimiz
18.plot: With the arrival of Commissar Emrah to Çukur, Koçovali Family's have a new enemy. Sena confronts her past fears. Idris is going to experience the shock of his life with a surprise.

19.title: Büyük Yüzlesme
19.plot: "Will Selim live?" the question creates great curiosity. Vartolu and Yamaç's confrontation will deeply affect both sides. The greatest confrontation for Vartolu will be with Idris.

20.title: Çukur Vartolu
20.plot: Vartolu, who confronts Idris, has two options: be a Salih Koçovali or Vartolu Sadettin. Baykal will cause irreversible pain for Yamaç while everyone is threatening.

21.title: Dejavu
21.plot: The return of Vartolu is not only for the pit but also for Baykal. Feeling himself trapped, Yamaç will make a surprising business alliance to get the revenge of those who go.

22.title: Sah Mat
22.plot: The game played by Vartolu and Yamac to Baykal will be unexpected and heavy. The actual struggle in the pit is just beginning. Yamac and Idris are waiting for a geared enemy.

23.title: Heyecani Yok
23.plot: Elvis kidnapped Koçovali women. Yamaç and Vartolu turns into a crazy in the face of this dangerous move. Elvis and his gang will not stay empty for a second until he gets to Baykal. Koçovali women will be rescued by a surprise name after the tough struggle between the two sides.

24.title: Alla beni Pulla beni
24.plot: Nedret, with the gun in her hand, stands at the gate of Vartolu. However, bullet from the gun will upset Koçovali family. Sultan gives life struggle. Stones play in the pit.

25.title: Babalar ve Ogullari
25.plot: Vartolu is declared a sinner because of the Sultan's condition. The party Vartolu chooses to meet with Nazim and Emrah re-ignites the struggle in the past.

26.title: Kim Hakli Affet
26.plot: The great danger to be experienced in Çukur, where all the balances are completely changed, will deeply affect the lives of many people, especially Yamaç.

27.title: Çukurda Hesap Zamani
27.plot: Yamaç tries to solve the problems with Sena while trying to balance the battle between Vartolu and his father on the one hand. But secrets will open the distance between lovers.

28.title: Dügünümüz Var
28.plot: Vartolu, who takes Idris Koçovali in favor of Sena, makes Yamaç one of his chief enemies. Yamaç, who does not see anything from his furious eye, asks the account of Sena and Vartolu.

29.title: Simdi Basliyoruz
29.plot: The business association between Vartolu, Selim, Emrah and Nazim is getting stronger. How Yamaç will be affected by this secret alliance creates a big question mark in mind.

30.title: Gemileri Yakmak
30.plot: Idris and Vartolu are taken hostage while Yamaç, Selim, Emmi and Pasha, who are trapped in the cold air store, give life war. Meanwhile, there is news from prison.

31.title: Çukur
31.plot: Yamac will not give up and he start a big game. As a result of this game, the winner is expected with great curiosity, and will be the beginning of the great real battle that one of the Koçovali's will learn.

32.title: Çukurun Yamacinda
32.plot: Idris Koçovali takes the greatest impulse of his life from his own son. Nazim, Emrah, Vartolu and Selim in the face of the power of the Koçovali family, the first time in the rescue is in despair Çukur.

33.title: Büyük Hesaplasma
33.plot: Idris Koçovali, who suffered the greatest destruction of his life with the betrayal of Selim, will declare his defeat in this fight and leave Çukur to Vartolu. Yamaç continues to fight.

imdb.plot outline: The control of Çukur from Istanbul's most troubled neighborhoods is in the hands of the Koçova family. While the Koçovars directed Çukur, the most important rules are that they should never allow drugs. However, the current order is distorted by the emergence of a new group whose eyes are planted in this neighborhood and are prepared to break this law. When the whole Koçovalis thought they had given up, the younger son of the family, Yamaç, would return to the pit he left behind years ago to set up a totally different life, and a new era will begin. The hillside had fallen behind a pitiful life that did not think of tomorrow by leaving Çukur and his family behind years ago. She believes that she finds eternal love when she emerges, a young woman who is at least as unconscious, wounded and dangerous as she is, but as beautiful as she is. With this reunion of Çukur and Yamaç's family, this young couple who met together to be "happy as to die" will not be like they have dreamed of anymore. Will the slope of the slope of Cukur and the past of Sena allow them to establish a common life?
imdb.title: The Pit
plot: A dangerous neighborhood, "_The Pit_ (qv)", ran by a noble mafia family called Koçovars. When the family is in the danger of losing the control of _The Pit_ (qv), their youngest son now must come back to his home, where he could never escape from.::Ilker Oner

The control of Çukur from Istanbul's most troubled neighborhoods is in the hands of the Koçova family. While the Koçovars directed Çukur, the most important rules are that they should never allow drugs. However, the current order is distorted by the emergence of a new group whose eyes are planted in this neighborhood and are prepared to break this law. When the whole Koçovalis thought they had given up, the younger son of the family, Yamaç, would return to the pit he left behind years ago to set up a totally different life, and a new era will begin. The hillside had fallen behind a pitiful life that did not think of tomorrow by leaving Çukur and his family behind years ago. She believes that she finds eternal love when she emerges, a young woman who is at least as unconscious, wounded and dangerous as she is, but as beautiful as she is. With this reunion of Çukur and Yamaç's family, this young couple who met together to be "happy as to die" will not be like they have dreamed of anymore. Will the slope of the slope of Cukur and the past of Sena allow them to establish a common life?::ahmetkozan

Çukur, one of the most dangerous neighborhoods of Istanbul, is ruled by the Koçova family. Although they are closely related to crime, the family has its own rules. One of these rules is the prohibition of drugs. Drugs cannot be produced, used or sold in Çukur. But one of the upstarts is determined to break the ban. First he tries to negotiate with the Koçova's but when his request is rejected he attacks the neighborhood and the family with his power. Just as he thinks that he has put the family on their knees something unpredicted comes up. Now the cards need to be dealt again. Yamaç is a young man who has focused himself on living life the way he wants to. He's a man who doesn't think about tomorrow. One night he meets a beautiful young woman as wounded and dangerous as himself. Her name is Sena. Soon they fall in love and get married. While thinking that they would live "happily ever after", Yamaç's family that he believed he had left behind comes between them. As Sena follows Yamaç and runs in the family, they are not aware that their lives will never be the same.::ahmetkozan
